channel.title: My Barrows boots
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i192.photobucket.com/albums/z174/Hasumon/mybarrowsboots.png[/img] My model is win... no not really. I didn't have any barrows id to get the correct colors so i had to try to get em myself by trying on different colors. This was from a steel boots model. SilentCJ was meh inspiration since he said he could do these easily so i spend about 15 minutes to do this. Think its good? Think its bad? TELL ME! Ima try some of my own custom items. Sorry SilentCJ, i had to take your idea :p
::EDIT:: Oh noes the spikes are a bit off. I got to fix that :o
::EDITEDIT:: I need help actually adding in the model into the client as i tried .dat to file and to rar and to gzip and added ints/model but i tried add model ##### and restarted the client to only see myself invisible when wearing it. Help me with this and ill give the download lolololol.

item.title: My Barrows boots
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“daniel89, post:8, topic:237492”]yeah you have to use the create part and select triangles and make them like that you cant use primitive or it wont work, Also if u got the gzip application in the folder with it drag and drop it on the gzip application and it will gzip it.

Your probley gona have to delete the spikes and make them with create using triangles no lines or quads as it will seriously fuck up your model and go invislbe when you wear. lemme know how it comes :P[/quote]

That guy obviously never heard of a thing called triangulating.

[quote=“hasumon, post:21, topic:237492”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=313561.msg2498322#msg2498322 date=1224521788]
it is very nice for first model

Thxs man tear it means alot to me… tear lul
I got it working on my client and doesn’t look THAT corrupted. I don’t want to waste your time since this is a pretty crappy model i made imo since i didn’t put much effort in it. Maybe in my next one ill contact you for help :p[/quote]

Lol ok

Read full topic

item.title: My Barrows boots
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“daniel89, post:8, topic:237492”]yeah you have to use the create part and select triangles and make them like that you cant use primitive or it wont work, Also if u got the gzip application in the folder with it drag and drop it on the gzip application and it will gzip it.

Your probley gona have to delete the spikes and make them with create using triangles no lines or quads as it will seriously fuck up your model and go invislbe when you wear. lemme know how it comes :P[/quote]

No you are a moron.
Wrong wrong wrong.

Hasumon, send me the model, and i’ll convert and everything. And upload if you want.

And GJ btw, it wasn’t even my idea lol, someone requested so i just sorta made.
And it is very nice for first model

Read full topic

item.title: My Barrows boots
item.dc:creator: @daniel89 daniel89
item.description:
@daniel89 wrote:

Just edit this int and add in your drop model id and your equip id and change the name discribition and the item id should fix the drop inventory if not you might be using a bad itemid so if it still apears change item id to something else

if(i == 15350){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 0; class8.anInt174 = 13422;//item drop inventory look class8.anInt181 = 724; class8.anInt190 = 175; class8.anInt198 = 2045; class8.anInt204 = 144; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = 3; class8.anInt165 = 13423; //equip id class8.anInt200 = 13423; //equip id class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Bandos boots"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A nice set of Bandos boots, worn once by the god Bandos.".getBytes(); }

Read full topic

nice[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2008, 03:10:49 pm[/size][hr][quote=“hasumon, post:16, topic:237492”]Got them into the client but i see lines in between my boots when i move, part of the lower leg is cut off, and when dropped there are 3 options saying
( … Barrows boots
Take barrows boots
Examine barrows boots )
help is appreciated.[/quote]

If i find something that will help I’ll post it for you I’ll probaly just look at rune-serve or here…
